actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill making laws and regulations of the State of Washington pertaining to fishing and hunting applicable to Indians and Indian tribes fishing and hunting at places (other than on Indian reservations) within such State for purposes other than ceremonial purposes.
short_title: Washington State Fishing and Hunting Equal Rights Act

summary.text: Washington State Fishing and Hunting Equal Rights Act - Declares that the fishing and hunting laws and regulations of the State of Washington shall apply to Indians and Indian tribes (except on Indian reservations or on ceremonial occasions) in the same manner and to the same extent as such laws and regulations apply to other persons.

titles.title: Washington State Fishing and Hunting Equal Rights Act

A bill making laws and regulations of the State of Washington pertaining to fishing and hunting applicable to Indians and Indian tribes fishing and hunting at places (other than on Indian reservations) within such State for purposes other than ceremonial purposes.
